channel.title: Getting perfect pickup
channel.description: Okay I want it so players dont have to click on an item 1000 times to pick it up. I want it strictly so it picks up the item in 1 click with no dupe problems. If anyone could help me that would be great I've been searching for a tutorial for about 2 months now and every time I've asked for help to find one or anything no one will ever help me accept complain that I need to learn java. If you're gonna complain you need to go learn some java because complaining that I posted this just means you dont know what to do.

item.title: Getting perfect pickup
item.dc:creator: @Spy2805 Spy2805
item.description:
@Spy2805 wrote:

Hmmmm i understand what you mean i cannot help you but this will be useful for me aswell Good Luck on finding the answer
